author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GIL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE ON FRIDAY...
summary: ...GIL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE ON FRIDAY... As of 11:00 PM HST Thu Jul 31 the center of Gil was located near 14.8, -120.1 with movement WNW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 997 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GIL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE ON FRIDAY... As of 11:00 PM HST Thu Jul 31 the center of Gil was located near 14.8, -120.1 with movement WNW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 997 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Gil (EP2/EP072025)
